question: I have previously earned credits for the course in the free elective area, and I would like to know if these credits can be reallocated to the Databases and Information Systems area for the winter semester 24/25. If not, can I take the course again to earn credit in that area?"
answer: Please contact the secretary of the examination board responsible for your program for assistance with this matter. You can find their contact information here: cit.tum.de/en/cit/contact-studies-informatics/
